Description: This class is an Utility Class. It provides utility to copy values from a Request/Response of one layer to the corresponding Request/Response of the next layer in Architecture. File: RequestResponseConverter.java Module: gov.ca.dmv.ease.docs.util Created: Jul 15, 2009
